text: Hi guys! I would like to ask, if it is possible to create separate page for phone design and desktop design? Would it be two separate templates? If yes how would they be published? Or is it possible only with query and that's enough? Because I have been asked to create page accordign to different mobile and different desktop design. Thanks!

You can use smart content to differentiate between desktop and mobile, but I would not recommend using it to make completely different designs. You should be using a responsive design with CSS queries to change layout based on widths.
